overview: After losing a fistfight to his romantic rival, wastrelly Clinton Philbrook skulks off to the North Woods. Hoping to redeem himself in the eyes of his sweetheart Alicia Van Orden, Clinton signs on as an apprentice to trapper Pierre Bechard.
tagline: From Fashionable Clubs to Log Cabins...A Mollycoddle Battled His Way Back to Manhood And A great Love.
title: The Coward
